member.name: T:iRacingReplayControl.Driver
member.summary: Represents a driver in the current session.

member.name: P:iRacingReplayControl.Driver.Id
member.summary: The identifier (CarIdx) of this driver (unique to this session)

member.summary: The current position of the driver

member.summary: The name of the driver

member.summary: The customer ID (custid) of the driver

member.name: P:iRacingReplayControl.Driver.Number
member.summary: The car number of this driver

member.summary: A unique identifier for the car class this driver is using

member.name: P:iRacingReplayControl.Driver.CarPath
member.summary: The name of the car of this driver

member.name: P:iRacingReplayControl.Driver.CarClassRelSpeed
member.summary: The relative speed of this class in a multiclass session

member.name: P:iRacingReplayControl.Driver.TrackSurface
member.summary: Used to determine if a driver is in the pits, off or on track

member.name: P:iRacingReplayControl.Driver.IsInPits
member.summary: Whether or not the driver is currently in or approaching the pit stall

member.summary: The lap this driver is currently in

member.name: P:iRacingReplayControl.Driver.LapDistance
member.summary: The distance along the current lap of this driver (in percentage)

member.name: P:iRacingReplayControl.Driver.RelativeLapDistance
